description: TEHRAN – Esteghlal football team edged past relegation-threatened Foolad 1-0 here in the 2023/24 Iran’s Persian Gulf Pro League (PGPL) on Monday.
title: PGPL: Esteghlal return to top after edging Foolad

description: TEHRAN - Major General Hossein Salami, the chief commander of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC), has underscored the resilience of Iran in the face of imposed sanctions on the nation.
title: Islamic Iran achieved success wherever it faced sanctions: IRGC chief

description: TEHRAN- Mahmood Hosseini Pour has been chosen as the new Vice-President for parliamentary affairs.
title: President Raisi appoints new Vice-President for parliamentary affairs

description: TEHRAN- In a tweet on Monday, Rahmatullah Faizan, the deputy representative of the Taliban Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Herat, lauded Iran's swift response following natural disasters in Afghanistan.
title: Afghanistan commends Iran's aid to earthquake, flood victims

description: TEHRAN - In an analysis, Kayhan dealt with the strategy of Raisi's administration and wrote: The policy of the 13th government was to overcome unfair sanctions and not rely on the negotiation option.
title: Changing balance in region with the effective strategy of Raisi administration

description: TEHRAN - Andrei Zhiltsov, Consul General of the Russian Federation in Isfahan, has emphasized the mutual benefits of expanding Russia-Iran relations, highlighting the considerable potential for bilateral cooperation.
title: Russian diplomat affirms strong partnership with Iran amidst global challenges

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Deputy Foreign Minister for Political Affairs, Ali Bagheri Kani, has called upon the United Nations and international organizations to prioritize efforts aimed at promoting peace, security, and prosperity in Afghanistan.
title: Iran urges global action for peace in Afghanistan

description: TEHRAN- The head of the Iran-China Friendship Association Alaeddin Boroujerdi emphasized that Tehran does not have any restrictions on the development of relations between the two countries, and that there is ample room for increasing cooperation in various fields.
title: Iran asserts no restrictions on cementing cooperation with China

description: TEHRAN- The spokesperson for the Foreign Ministry stated that Tehran has both the fatwa of the Leader of Islamic Revolution as stating the prohibition of inhumane weapons based on the Islamic religion and does believe that these weapons pose a threat to the global community.
title: No change in Iran nuclear doctrine: Foreign Ministry

description: TEHRAN - British Foreign Secretary David Cameron said on Sunday that it would be "not wise" for Britain to suspend arms sales to Israel now that it is preparing to launch a major offensive in the southernmost city of Rafah in Gaza.
title: David Cameron is either idiot or delusional

description: TEHRAN - Israeli strikes against the Gaza Strip continue unabated as the death toll from the regime’s genocidal war that began in early October surpasses 35,000.
title: Cold-blooded savagery

description: US Army Major Harrison Mann, who works for the Defense Intelligence Agency, has announced his resignation, which he submitted on April 16, saying he “cannot justify staying silent any longer”.
title: Defense intelligence officer resigns in protest of US policy on Gaza war

description: TEHRAN- Surveys conducted by Israeli research groups reveal that the majority of the Israeli population are in favor of a deal to release captives over the ongoing military action in Gaza.
title: Israeli polls show captive deal a priority over war

description: TEHRAN - The third Iranian-Arab Dialogue Conference, themed "For Cooperation and Interaction," convened in Tehran on Sunday, signaling a pivotal moment in regional diplomacy.
title: Iran embraces Arabs

description: Senator Lindsey Graham has compared Israel’s war on Gaza to the US decision to drop atomic bombs on Japan in World War II during an interview on NBC News’ “Meet the Press.”
title: US senator: Israel has the right to nuke Gaza

description: A pro-Palestinian rally took place at Colombia’s El Dorado International Airport as activists gathered to welcome the Club Deportivo Palestino football team from Chile.
title: Colombians welcome ‘Palestino’ football team at airport

description: New polls have revealed an erosion of support for US President Joe Biden ahead of the November presidential election over Washington’s support for Israel’s war on Gaza.
title: Polls highlight discontent over Biden’s handling of Gaza war

description: Demonstrators have taken over university buildings in the Dutch cities of Amsterdam, Groningen and Eindhoven, slamming Israel’s war in Gaza, the Dutch protest group behind the action says in a statement.
title: Pro-Palestine protesters take over university buildings in Dutch cities

description: Russia said on Monday its forces have entered the north-eastern border town of Vovchansk, near Ukraine's second largest city Kharkiv, BBC reported.
title: Russian troops enter border town near Kharkiv

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has nominated an economist to replace longtime defense minister Sergei Shoigu as the country is trying to better utilize defense spending and harness greater innovation to win the war in Ukraine.
title: Putin replaces defense minister

description: TEHRAN- The Film Museum of Iran, in collaboration with National Film Archive of Iran, is set to showcase parts of a restored version of "Ferdowsi", a biopic about the Persian poet directed by Abdolhossein Sepanta in 1934.
title: Film Museum to showcase restored biopic “Ferdowsi” from 1934

description: TEHRAN- Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, has written a commendation for "Carpet Weaver Girl," a biography that narrates the life of martyr Golab Ali Hosseinzadeh and his devoted wife.
title: Leader praises "Carpet Weaver Girl" in a published commendation

description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of the book “The Biggest Prison on Earth” written by the Israeli historian Ilan Pappe has hit the Iranian bookstores.
title: Book by Israeli historian on occupied territories published in Persian

description: TEHRAN- Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, visited the 35th edition of the Tehran International Book Fair (TIBF) on Monday morning.
title: Ayatollah Khamenei visits 35th Tehran Intl. Book Fair

description: TEHRAN – Omid Souri will lead Iran’s men national tennis team in the 2024 Davis Cup.
title: Omid Souri named Iran tennis coach

description: TEHRAN – A rosewater festival is currently underway at Tehran’s Eshragh Cultural Center, captivating visitors with a myriad of cultural and artistic programs.
title: Rosewater festival: a celebration of tradition and culture underway in Tehran

description: TEHRAN – Agritourism is on the rise in Alborz province, which is home to many villages and fruit gardens at the foot of Alborz mountains.
title: Agritourism on the rise in Alborz province

description: TEHRAN – Key talks between the Ministry of Cultural Heritage, Tourism and Handicrafts, and a number of domestic airlines have highlighted a push for promoting tourism.
title: Iranian airlines set to promote tourism contents

description: TEHRAN - An Australian couple, traveling in their classic Bean car from England to Australia, entered Iran on Sunday, recreating a tourist’s epic journey, named Francis Birtles on 1927.
title: Reviving a century-old journey: Australian couple arrive in Iran with classic car

description: TEHRAN – A tribal festival of vibrant culture and rich heritage is currently underway amidst the picturesque plains in Ardabil province.
title: Tribal charm fills the air in Ardabil’s picturesque plains

description: TEHRAN – Kyrgyzstan swept past Iran in straight sets (25-25, 25-23, 25-19) at the Central Asian Volleyball Association (CAVA) Nation’s Volleyball League on Monday.
title: Kyrgyzstan sweep Iran at CAVA Nation’s Volleyball League

description: TEHRAN - Mehdi Taremi, Iranian striker of Porto, bade an emotional farewell to the fans in his last game at the team's home stadium.
title: Mehdi Taremi bids farewell to Porto with tears and brilliance

description: TEHRAN  – Iran hammered Oman 8-0 in the 2024 Women's Indoor Hockey Asia Cup on Monday.
title: Iran down Oman at 2024 Women's Indoor Hockey Asia Cup

description: Persian deer, known as maral in Iran, was unfortunately on the brink of extinction over the past decades.
title: Maral, the beautiful Persian deer

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Astronomy Association is celebrating International Astronomy Week in collaboration with amateur groups from May 13 to 19.
title: Iran celebrating intl. astronomy week

description: TEHRAN –The National Youthful Population Week commenced today with the theme of ‘My share in youthful population’ and will wrap up on May 19.
title: National youthful population week kicks off

description: TEHRAN –The World Meteorological Organization (WMO) has released a report on the State of the Climate in Asia, enumerating climate hazards and severe weather events in Iran in 2023.
title: WMO report counts extreme climatic events in Iran

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Para archer Zahra Nemati will likely miss the 2024 Paralympic Games, Jalil Koohpayehzadeh, head of Iran's Sports Federation for the Disabled, said on Monday.
title: Nemati’s participation in 2024 Paralympics not certain: official

description: TEHRAN - The head of the Iranian Mines and Mining Industries Development and Renovation Organization (IMIDRO) has said over $1.8 billion worth of mining projects went operational during the previous Iranian calendar year (ended on March 19).
title: Over $1.8b of mining industry projects put in operation in a year

description: TEHRAN - The latest official figures show that Iran’s renewable electricity production reached 1.186 gigawatts in April.
title: Iran’s renewable capacity at 1.186 GW in April

description: TEHRAN - The commander of the IRGC’s Khatam-al Anbiya Construction Headquarters said that the first phase of the Persian Gulf Mehr Refinery will become operational by the end of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20, 2025).
title: 1st phase of Persian Gulf Mehr refinery to go operational by Mar. 2025

description: TEHRAN - Iran is ready to produce gasoline observing requirements of Euro-5 standard rules and regulations, according to the head of Imam Khomeini Oil Refining Company.
title: Iran to produce gasoline with Euro-5 standard

description: TEHRAN – Iran and India signed a long-term agreement on Monday based on which India Ports Global Limited (IPGL) will operate a terminal at the strategic Chabahar port as it seeks to expand trade in Central Asia.
title: India signs port deal with Iran to operate in Chabahar Port

description: TEHRAN – Zahra Inche Dargahi was re-elected unopposed as president of Iran Gymnastic Federation on Monday for a four-year term till 2028.
title: Inche Dargahi re-elected as president of Iran Gymnastic Federation

description: TEHRAN - Turkey is interested in buying more gas from Iran, said the director general of the Mediterranean and Eastern Europe department of the Foreign Ministry, adding that transit of Iranian gas to Eastern Europe through Turkey is possible.
title: Transit of Iranian gas to Eastern Europe through Turkey possible: official

description: TEHRAN – Following the downward trend of the previous week, TEDPIX the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE) lost 32,391 points on Monday to stand at 2,160,780, IRNA reported.
title: TEDPIX falls over 32,000 points on Monday

description: TEHRAN - With the assistance of the National Iranian Oil Company (NIOC)’s board of directors and the allocation of 800 million euros during the past 2.5 years of the 13th administration in office, the Iranian Offshore Oil Company (IOOC) has been able to take appropriate steps to renovate its installations.
title: €800m allocated to IOOC’s infrastructure renovation

description: Egypt says it will formally join the lawsuit filed by South Africa against Israel at the International Court of Justice which accuses Israel of violating its obligations under the Genocide Convention in the Gaza Strip.
title: Egypt to join South Africa’s ICJ genocide case against Israel
